subject: Re: Dynamic URL's - Not Working
preview: Hi Kosta,  Just a quick note to correct my earlier email  apologies for misspelling your name.  Thanks again, and glad the Dynamic URLs are working well for you!  Let us know if there's anything else

full_threads.body:
Hi Kosta,

Just a quick note to correct my earlier email apologies for misspelling your name.

Thanks again, and glad the Dynamic URLs are working well for you!

Let us know if there's anything else we can do, always happy to help

Hi Costa,

Jumping in for Joy, I’m glad to hear the Dynamic URLs are looking good for you!

Please don’t hesitate to reach out if there’s anything else we can do to help.

Always happy to support.

Hi all,

Dynamic URL's look good.

Cheers,
Kosta

No action needed from us.
Closing this ticket for now.

Hey team,

thanks for that, much appreciated

kosta@pointdot.com.au - do you mind checking to make sure you're happy with everything before i process final payment of the site works

Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

Hi Luca,

Hope you are having a great week!

The following are our updates for nardiplumbing.com.au:

  • Dynamic suburb pages- are working and tested.
  • Hot Water Heaters - New template has been successfully copied for the Hot Water Heaters page. You can check the page here.
  • Response template - Here's a sample screenshot of the response template we currently use when replying to the form queries. Let us know if this is good or if you are looking for something else so we can check it for you.

We look forward to hearing your thoughts very soon.
Noted @allieB . Assigned this in ClickUp.
Hey @joy - as for our meeting ( @whil might be the best person for this) - passing this to you and this is a P1

Hi Luca,

Thanks for your message, and apologies for the delay in getting back to you.

We completely understand where you're coming from and appreciate you flagging this.

We'll make sure a full check is done to confirm that all suburb pages are properly dynamic and the backend setup is clean, especially with your campaign coming up.

Thanks again for your patience, and we'll ensure everything's in order before the final invoice is settled.

Andy

Hi @joel , I don’t have much context on the previous ticket for the dynamic suburb pages. Luca has asked us to double-check the backend before he makes final payment, to make sure all suburb service pages (including Hot Water Heaters and similar one-off templates) are coded correctly and remain dynamic. Could you please review this one?

I've ensured all the service page had that code block but I'm not sure if I'm missing something related to the ticket months ago 🙏

Thanks team

As I still have to pay the invoice for the build can you please check over the website before any payments are made to ensure all suburb pages are in fact dynamic and correctly coded on the backend to ensure our ads are no conflicting with pages with dynamic text

We will be pushing a big campaign live in the next couple of weeks and want to ensure the hard word put in by the team at point dot isn't wasted on a few minor backend issues

- Kosta, happy for you to give me a chat if you need to check over anything to make sure it's all been inputted correctly before I make a final payment to wolfiq

Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body: (Time: 25mins) + debugging, clear cache, applying to all pages

Hi Kosta,

Thank you so much for letting us know.

Just confirming I’ve updated the suburb text and made it dynamic again for these pages:
  • Beecroft
  • Chatswood

Could you take a quick look and let me know if this is what you were after?

Happy to tweak anything if needed.
Cool - please let Costa know (and track our time). Thank you
hey @andy - we've fixed this 🙏, thank you!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body: @joel set this up a few months back so might be able to help fastest.
figurting this out in the back-end (will take time)

Hi Allie,

Should definitely change the suburb in the first fold mainly.

Andy was across this previously so might be worth discussing with him internally to get more context.

Cheers,
Kosta
